verbs.description: [ARG0: Rob Herrick] [V: says] [ARG1: Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . I agree that he did not reveal her covert status but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable] . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says [ARG0: Scooter Libby] [V: had] [ARG1: nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame] . I agree that he did not reveal her covert status but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had [ARG2: nothing] to [V: do] [ARG1: with the outing of Valerie Plame] . I agree that he did not reveal her covert status but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . [ARG0: I] [V: agree] [ARG1: that he did not reveal her covert status but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI] . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . I agree that he [V: did] not reveal her covert status but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . I agree that [ARG0: he] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: reveal] [ARG1: her covert status] but he was tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . Trump probably does n't think lying to the FBI should be a crime so his pardon of Libby is understandable . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...

Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . I agree that he did not reveal her covert status but he [V: was] tried and convicted of lying to the FBI . Rob Herrick says Scooter Libby had nothing to do with the outing of Valerie Plame . I agree that he did not reveal her covert status but [ARG1: he] was [V: tried] and convicted [ARG2: of lying to the FBI] . The honor for outing Plame goes to that collection of chicken hawks headed up by draft - dodging Dick Cheney . What Libby did was try to help cover it up and he paid the price although he served no time . Plame was outed to punish her husband for not going along with the lie that Saddam Hussein was trying to purchase uranium for a nuclear weapon . The chicken hawks wanted an excuse to invade Iraq . My low opinion of Trump began when he attacked John McCain , ridiculing his service and the 5 1/2 years he spent as a POW , declaring that McCain was not a hero . I served for five years and most of us were n't heroes either , but we did do our duty and served honorably as did McCain while Trump , of course , dodged the draft . Making Trump look bad is easy . Just let him ...
